TEXT.TITLE: UNITED CITIES <UCIT> MAKES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: United Cities Gas Co said it has acquired Lyle Propane Gas Co, a Cairo, Ga., propane gas distributor, for undisclosed terms. It said Lyle has sales of about four mln gallons annually and serves about 4,000 customers in seven counties in southwest Georgia and north Florida. Reuter
